info.name: Dark Stylus
info.description:
Dark version of manage pages in the Stylus Chrome extension,Opera extension, and Firefox extension!

This style is the same as style 127038 I just wanted it to be on its own without custom settings to choose :)
info.additionalInfo: To continue receiving updates for my styles install them from here using the Stylus browser extension!

data.title: Looks good, but needs some work
